Here's a vid from me surfing the map:


<object width="300"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/OLWLann5D34&hl=en_US&fs=1&"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/OLWLann5D34&hl=en_US&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="300"></embed></object>


Thanks to Power-Wave & Serenity-Surf for letting me and Sangre test on their server.

Thanks to KarateKaefer for the Skybox (mpa35).

The system of the map:

The first round, the order is stage 1 >> stage 2 + regular jail 1.
The round after, the order is stage 2 >> stage 1 + regular jail 2 (from sangre <3).
And so on.. It changes every round.

Many Thanks to:  Serenity Surf and Power-Wave !
